title: Just got banned for no reason?
body:
Hey guys,

Just wondering if anyone else just got banned. I just logged on for a game and as I was in champ select I got a message saying my account had just been banned. I then checked my emails and it stated that I was banned for the use of a third party program?

I have had this account since the start of 2012 and I have not once used any program that would give me any kind of advantage over another player.

I am just wondering if this has happened to anyone else?

Regards,
Rampage

replies.body: When you say a program that gives an advantage, does that mean you use other programs that affect your league of legends game such as skins or macros?

[Check this list](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt). It is by no means definitive, but gives a pretty good idea.
With everything, better safe than sorry and stay away from any kind of modification (even if it is just skins/VOs)

actually V/O's are actually very simple to use, and since it's using things that are already ingame, just from other regions it's safe.
*selfish video plug here* https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T9q6IskIKHE

You sure about this?
Maybe you used a program that you thought does not affect the gameplay but actually does.
I don't think a program used to change my skin affects the game play at all?
Why would you use MK LoL Its a 3rd party mod, and you got banned for it, take a think, its your fault
Can you atleast pretend you read the thread before posting something silly

"I don't think a program used to change my skin affects the game play at all?"

A skin changer is a 3rd party mod, therefore it is bannable. Rito wants their money, and no free skin modding system is gonna take that from them, hence ban.

I understand that, however the thread that the other guy linked me states that skin changers aren't strictly bannable hence a permanent ban over that without any prior warnings seems a bit harsh tbh.

It's not as if I haven't spent money on the game, I have had this account since January 2012 and have spent more than my fair share on the game.

Let me say it again

It's Rito, if Rito is losing money to even the smallest things, they can get angry and ban you for not paying to play their free to play game. About 40% of 3rd party bans are from skin changers, 60% of those skin changers are mk lol

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=L0T6qEMe,comment-id=0003000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-22T12:19:37.922+0000)
>
> It's Rito, if Rito is losing money to even the smallest things, they can get angry and ban you for not paying to play their free to play game. About 40% of 3rd party bans are from skin changers, 60% of those skin changers are mk lol

Personally, I'd *love* to see a source for those statistics.

Oh wait, let me guess. They're "estimates", aren't they?

based on complaints by people for being banned because they used "3rd party software"(100 cases). It is based off those who admitted to using a Skin changer, MK lol just had a 6/10 (based on 40 cases), its crude, but it gives a pretty good idea.
I don't understand why you keep mentioning MK

Skin changer? Hmmm.. you're right, it does not affect the gameplay whatsoever. Please do send a support ticket to riot concerning this problem and do send only ONE. Sending multiple tickets can cause longer response time. Goodluck in retrieving your account back :D

It does modify client files though, which is very much a "use at your own risk" scenario. Riot don't normally ban just for skin changers, but if something disallowed was added to the program that could trigger it. I don't have all the details here I'm afraid, all I cay say is that the 3rd party bans are generally speaking the most accurate, so intentional or not, it's unlikely it's a false positive.

Support is his best bet, but no guarantees on them being able to give any info other than a yes it was legitimate or no it wasn't.
As I have stated previously, this program has no other features anywhere other than for skin purposes.
As I said I don't know all the details, if you name the program maybe I can tell you if something has changed with it, otherwise following through with support is your best bet for getting an answer,

Yeah I am currently waiting for a response from support.

I don't think they are situated in Australia, as I usually get a response around 1am.

Maybe naming the program can help so that I can do some research on it. Some harmless 3rd party program can trigger the system which then alerts rito and automatically ban you because of the system misinterpreting the harmless 3rd program as a cheating program. Please do tell me the name of the program so I can give you further details about the program you are using
LolPro Skins or something along those lines.

There is a support team in Aus, but I don't know how big it is (not very to the best of my knowledge). Most of the English support is in NA.

It's about 6am where there offices are now so sometime 'today' hopefully they will get back to you :)
I already have sent one, was just posting to see if this has happened to anyone else.

Got this reply from them today:
https://gyazo.com/00c63f5550c0e9d7840996f5a21450f6

I think it is pathetic how they are unable to enlighten me, and even worse that I am only worth a copy paste message.

This is my second response:
http://s31.postimg.org/vpeackq2z/Screenshot_2016_04_23_08_14_27.png

They are saying I have been using an exploit, however I know for a fact that I haven't been. What can I do guys?
Don't use skype or teamspeak. Jeez don't people realise those are 3rd party and they give an unfair advantage.

Hello,
Yes the exact same thing happened to me. a rioter got on to me not being very helpful at all. Could we please have our accounts back we did nothing wrong.

Shazu
I got a response this morning that was a copy paste basically saying that I am banned but they can't tell me why.

Atm, Skin changing applications are being monitored. MK recently has been removed for it is now a 3rd party program because even though it changes your skin, it also has jungle timers etc. At the moment, I do not know what program you are using but if you did get banned, I assume its not allowed. Anyways, Goodluck on getting your account back!

Yeah I have heard about the problems with that program, however I can assure you that this program is solely used just for the skins and does not offer any additional features - if it did I would not have been using it.

No point risking 4 years of progress for something that stupid imo.

Have you used *anything* that affects the game files? Let me just be clear and say that when I say "anything" I do actually mean "anything and everything", not just things that would give you an advantage over other players. When you get right down to it, it can be quite difficult for the Rioters and the automated systems to differentiate between what gives an advantage and what is simply aestetic. Riot has even stated that skin/VO "mods" (and the like) are a "use at your own risk" situation, if I remember correctly, *because* they can't always tell if something that interacts with the game files is giving an unfair advantage to a particular player.
I have not used anything like that, it is just a program which lets you look at and choose a skin, nothing more than that.
Something like that *may* still be detected, though. I suggest getting in contact with support and asking about the specific program you use.
Wow - skin changer maybe? If you want to get unbanned you better get real honest real quick or goodbye account.

*We'll play good cop, bad cop.*

How are you feeling? Can I get you a drink? Tell me about what's happened to your account.

Sounds like a plan!

Stuff your drink OP, you'll have plenty of time to drink while you're busy not playing LoL cos you're banned!!!!

Probably got busted cheating. Probably starting a thread thinking you will get a warning or something.

One of two things has happened.

1. You've cheated - you deserve your ban and it wont be lifted
2. Someone has cheated on your account - you are responsible for your account and actions performed on it so your ban wont be lifed.

#getrekt

Wow you lose a lot and only got gold 4 with cheats. well done.... haha.

> [{quoted}](name=Noumea25,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=L0T6qEMe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-21T01:57:30.097+0000) 
> Wow you lose a lot and only got gold 4 with cheats. well done.... haha.

Never claimed to be good at the game?

I had a look at that list prior to posting this thread.

I have in fact used a program that lets me use skins but that is all - in that thread it says these such programs are allowed.
